END, [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Id] AS [Id0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[CorporationId], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[DateCreated], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[DateModified], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[UserCreated], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[UserModified], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Status], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.Product].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x.Product].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x.Product].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x.Product].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x.Product].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.Product].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.Product].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Path], [x].[Caption]
FROM [ProductImages] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [Products] AS [x.Product] ON [x].[ProductId] = [x.Product].[Id]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.Product.ProductCategory] ON [x.Product].[CategoryId] = [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]
WHERE [x].[ProductId] = @__productId_0
ORDER BY [x].[Id], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]" (0723d8ff)

    SELECT [x0].[ParentId], [x0].[Id]
    FROM [ProductCategories] AS [x0]
) AS [t] ON [x.Products].[CategoryId] = [t].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[ParentId], [t].[Id]" (0723d8ff)

""SELECT [t1].[DateCreated], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Id] AS [Id2], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Name], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Image], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Price], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[PromotionPrice], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[OriginalPrice], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Description], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Content], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[HomeFlag], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[HotFlag], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[ViewCount], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Tags], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Unit], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoPageTitle], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoAlias], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoKeywords], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoDescription], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[DateModified], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Status]
FROM [Products] AS [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[DateCreated], [t0].[Id], [x.BillDetails0].[Id] AS [Id0], [dto.Product.ProductCategory0].[Id] AS [Id1]
    FROM [BillDetails] AS [x.BillDetails0]
    INNER JOIN [Sizes] AS [dto.Size0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[SizeId] = [dto.Size0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [Colors] AS [dto.Color0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[ColorId] = [dto.Color0].[Id]

        SELECT [x1].[DateCreated], [x1].[Id]
        FROM [Bills] AS [x1]
        ORDER BY [x1].[DateCreated] DESC, [x1].[Id]
        OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
    ) AS [t0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[BillId] = [t0].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId] = [t1].[Id1]

END, [x.Product].[Name], [x.Product].[CategoryId], [x.Product].[Image], [x.Product].[Price], [x.Product].[PromotionPrice], [x.Product].[OriginalPrice], [x.Product].[Description], [x.Product].[Content], [x.Product].[HomeFlag], [x.Product].[HotFlag], [x.Product].[ViewCount], [x.Product].[Tags], [x.Product].[Unit], CASE
    WHEN [x.Product].[CategoryId] IS NOT NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Id] AS [Id0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[CorporationId], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[DateCreated], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[DateModified], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[UserCreated], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[UserModified], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Status], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.Product].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x.Product].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x.Product].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x.Product].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x.Product].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.Product].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.Product].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Path], [x].[Caption]
FROM [ProductImages] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [Products] AS [x.Product] ON [x].[ProductId] = [x.Product].[Id]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.Product.ProductCategory] ON [x.Product].[CategoryId] = [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]
WHERE [x].[ProductId] = @__productId_0
ORDER BY [x].[Id], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]" (0723d8ff)

    ORDER BY [x0].[DateCreated] DESC, [x0].[Id], [x.ProductCategory0].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t] ON [x.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId] = [t].[Id0]
ORDER BY [t].[DateCreated] DESC, [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]" (0723d8ff)

""SELECT [t1].[DateCreated], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Id] AS [Id2], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Name], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Image], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Price], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[PromotionPrice], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[OriginalPrice], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Description], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Content], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[HomeFlag], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[HotFlag], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[ViewCount], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Tags], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Unit], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoPageTitle], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoAlias], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoKeywords], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoDescription], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[DateModified], [dto.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Status]

    SELECT [t0].[DateCreated], [t0].[Id], [x.BillDetails0].[Id] AS [Id0], [dto.Product.ProductCategory0].[Id] AS [Id1]
    FROM [BillDetails] AS [x.BillDetails0]
    INNER JOIN [Sizes] AS [dto.Size0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[SizeId] = [dto.Size0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [Colors] AS [dto.Color0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[ColorId] = [dto.Color0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [dto.Product0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[ProductId] = [dto.Product0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [dto.Product.ProductCategory0] ON [dto.Product0].[CategoryId] = [dto.Product.ProductCategory0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [x1].[DateCreated], [x1].[Id]

    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.Product].[Name], [x.Product].[CategoryId], [x.Product].[Image], [x.Product].[Price], [x.Product].[PromotionPrice], [x.Product].[OriginalPrice], [x.Product].[Description], [x.Product].[Content], [x.Product].[HomeFlag], [x.Product].[HotFlag], [x.Product].[ViewCount], [x.Product].[Tags], [x.Product].[Unit], CASE
    WHEN [x.Product].[CategoryId] IS NOT NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Id] AS [Id0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[CorporationId], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[DateCreated], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[DateModified], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[UserCreated], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[UserModified], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Status], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.Product].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x.Product].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x.Product].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x.Product].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x.Product].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.Product].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.Product].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Path], [x].[Caption]
FROM [ProductImages] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [Products] AS [x.Product] ON [x].[ProductId] = [x.Product].[Id]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.Product.ProductCategory] ON [x.Product].[CategoryId] = [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]
WHERE [x].[ProductId] = @__productId_0
ORDER BY [x].[Id], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]" (0723d8ff)
